description:
Whenever users have important meetings, they closed the canopy alltogether. This way, the avoided that people try to talk to them even though they are busy.


One time we were testing a damaged canopy with a small hole in it. Even this small hole lead to situations where users where approached and verbally addressed even though they were in fact in a meeting.


The problem with closing the booth, however, might be that users forget to reopen it, even though the are in fact ready for being approached.


Users were reporting that a good headset with noise cancellation and a targeted microphone helps to stay focused to.
